BIO

I am Abhishek V, a dedicated and enthusiastic student pursuing BCA with a 93% score. I am also a web developer and am currently learning SCSS. i am proficient in JavaScript and have completed projects using vanilla JavaScript. i am dedicated and passionate about web development.
